# Data Clean

Delete values outside of Human and Natural in NWCG_CAUSE_CLASSIFICATION columns
(71 objects)

```{r}
data_clean <- data %>% 
  filter(!is.na(NWCG_CAUSE_CLASSIFICATION),NWCG_CAUSE_CLASSIFICATION %in% c("Human", "Natural"))
```

# Data split

```{r}
set.seed(43)

data_split <- initial_split(
    data_clean,
    prop = 0.7,
    strata = NWCG_CAUSE_CLASSIFICATION
)

train_data <- training(data_split)
test_data  <- testing(data_split)
```

```{r}
data_clean$NWCG_CAUSE_CLASSIFICATION <- factor(
  data_clean$NWCG_CAUSE_CLASSIFICATION,
  levels = c("Natural", "Human"))
```
